text:
When in /host-manager application one wants to see "Host Manager Help", link leads to 404 page.
Maybe we should supply "/host-manager/../docs/virtual-hosting-howto.html" instead of non working "/host-manager/../docs/host-manager-howto.html".
creator: pskopek@gmail.com

text: *** Bug 48671 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: knst.kolinko@gmail.com
markt@apache.org
text:
I've marked both the docs as todo and am changing this to an enhancement to write the docs.

It is worth linking to the virtual hosting docs but I think it would be more confusing to link to it directly.

creator: markt@apache.org
text: This remains a TODO item for Tomcat 9

creator: chris@christopherschultz.net
text:
Speculatively tagging this is "Beginner" because it is "only" a documentation patch.

(Should we add a "documentation" component for Tomcat 9?

creator: csutherl@apache.org
text:
(In reply to Christopher Schultz from comment #4)
> (Should we add a "documentation" component for Tomcat 9?

Added.
